aboutMe.first_p: I'm Tha Toe Saung, {age} years old, Frontend Lead developer. And I have more than {experience} years of experience.
aboutMe.second_p: I live in Bangkok, Thailand. The heighest university that I attended was second year,Geography specialization of Taungoo university.
aboutMe.third_p: I am passionate about leveraging my diverse backgrounds to decipher challenging problems and create delightful experiences. I honed my skills at web development.

skill.p1: I started study programming(web development) since 2021.
skill.p2: I'm Next JS developer. I have hand-on experience in working with semantic Html, CSS, SCSS/SASS, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Material UI JavaScript, React JS, NEXT.JS. I learned Git Hub, Npm, Yarn, Restful Api, GraphQL server etc, which are important for developers.
skill.p3: Although I'm a frontend developer, I used to write backend development language like Node JS, Express JS. And I have used database like MongoDB, Firebase, MySQL.
skill.p4: As work experience, I have over {experience} years realworld experience, I had compeleted a three-month internship as a frontend developer in World of Professional Singapore company. And I had worked 8 months as a full time developer there. And currently I'm working as a Frontend Lead developer at Flo3 UK company.

content: Proficient in Next.js and React for building efficient and scalable frontend applications.
Experienced in using TypeScript for static typing and improved code quality.
Familiarity with Node.js and Express.js for server-side rendering and backend development.
Proficient in GraphQL for efficient data fetching and manipulation.
Experienced in generating types and queries with GraphQL Codegen for streamlined development.
Familiar with Apollo and Urql for GraphQL client-side management.
Experienced in building and consuming RESTful APIs for data exchange.
Experience working with various databases including Firebase, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, and Microsoft Azure Storage.
Skilled in database design, optimization, and management for scalable applications.
Hands-on experience with Saleor E-commerce and Medusa E-commerce for building robust online shopping experiences.
Proficient in integrating and customizing e-commerce solutions to meet client requirements.
Utilized Builder.io for designing and managing dynamic and customizable frontend content.
Integrated email services such as SendGrid and Twilio for efficient communication and notification systems.
Proficient in debugging and error tracking using Sentry to ensure application stability and performance.
